definitions: The action of attaching or arranging things on a string or in a line.
The act of providing a string or strings for something, such as a musical instrument or a bow.
The process of forming a string or strings.
The act of extending or stretching out in a long line or series.
examples: She was busy stringing beads for the necklace.
The technician was stringing the new tennis racket.
He spent the afternoon stringing lights around the patio.
The children were stringing daisies together to make a chain.
